title: Summary - Hurricane Otis (EP3/EP182023)
author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary:
...STRONG WINDS CONTINUING TO SPREAD INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING OCCURRING OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Wed Oct 25
 the center of Otis was located near 17.7, -100.3
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 965 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.
